crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id':doc.account_id, 'x_fmc_value':doc.x_fmc_value, 'device_id':doc.device_id, 'a_number':doc.a_number}); }

full_crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'_id': doc._id, '_rev': doc._rev, 'account_id':doc.account_id, 'x_fmc_value':doc.x_fmc_value, 'device_id':doc.device_id, 'a_number':doc.a_number}); }

list_by_account_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.account_id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id':doc.account_id, 'x_fmc_value':doc.x_fmc_value, 'device_id':doc.device_id, 'a_number':doc.a_number}); }

list_by_device_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.device_id, {'id': doc._id, 'account_id':doc.account_id, 'x_fmc_value':doc.x_fmc_value, 'device_id':doc.device_id, 'a_number':doc.a_number}); }

list_by_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.a_number, doc.account_id); }

list_by_fmc_and_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fmc_device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.x_fmc_value, doc.a_number], {'id': doc._id, 'account_id':doc.account_id, 'x_fmc_value':doc.x_fmc_value, 'device_id':doc.device_id, 'a_number':doc.a_number}); }
